00036 #include "AspectRatioGammaQualityMetric.hpp"
00037 #include <math.h>
00038 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00039 #include "MsqMeshEntity.hpp"
00040 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00041 
00042 #include <vector>
00043 using std::vector;
00044 
00045 using namespace Mesquite;
00046 
00047 const double fourDivRootThree = 4.0/sqrt(3.0);
00048 const double twelveDivRootTwo = 12.0/sqrt(2.0);
00049 
00050 
00051 std::string AspectRatioGammaQualityMetric::get_name() const
00052   { return "AspectRatioGamma"; }
00053   
00054 int AspectRatioGammaQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00055   { return 1; }
00056 
00057 //note that we can define this metric for other element types?
00059 bool AspectRatioGammaQualityMetric::evaluate(PatchData &pd,
00060                                              size_t elem_index,
00061                                              double &fval,
00062                                              MsqError &err)
00063 {
00064   MsqMeshEntity& element = pd.element_by_index( elem_index );
00065   EntityTopology entity = element.get_element_type();
00066   double vol;
00067   Vector3D cross, normal(0,0,0);
00068   fval = MSQ_MAX_CAP;
00069   
00070     //get element's nodes
00071   vert.clear();
00072   pd.get_element_vertex_coordinates(elem_index, vert, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00073   
00074   switch(entity)
00075   {
00076     case TRIANGLE:
00077         //area
00078       cross = (vert[1] - vert[0]) * (vert[2] - vert[0]);
00079       vol= cross.length() / 2.0;
00080       if (vol < MSQ_MIN)
00081         return false;
00082       
00083       if (pd.domain_set()) { // need domain to check for inverted elements
00084         pd.get_domain_normal_at_corner( elem_index, 0, normal, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00085         if ((cross % normal) < -MSQ_MIN)
00086           return false;
00087       }
00088    
00089         // sum squares of edge lengths
00090       fval = ((vert[1] - vert[0]).length_squared()
00091             + (vert[2] - vert[0]).length_squared()
00092             + (vert[1] - vert[2]).length_squared());
00093         // average
00094       fval /= 3.0;
00095       
00096          //normalize to equil. and div by area
00097       fval /= vol * fourDivRootThree;
00098       
00099       break;
00100       
00101     case TETRAHEDRON:
00102       vol = (vert[1] - vert[0]) % ((vert[2] - vert[0]) * (vert[3] - vert[0])) / 6.0;
00103       if (vol < MSQ_MIN)  // zero for degenerate and negative for inverted
00104         return false;
00105       
00106 
00107         // sum squares of edge lengths
00108       fval = (vert[1] - vert[0]).length_squared()
00109            + (vert[2] - vert[0]).length_squared()
00110            + (vert[3] - vert[0]).length_squared()
00111            + (vert[2] - vert[1]).length_squared()
00112            + (vert[3] - vert[1]).length_squared()
00113            + (vert[3] - vert[2]).length_squared();
00114         // average
00115       fval /= 6.0;
00116       
00117       fval *= sqrt(fval);
00118         //normalize to equil. and div by volume
00119       fval /= vol * twelveDivRootTwo;
00120 
00121       break;
00122     default:
00123       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT, 
00124                      "Entity type %d is not valid for Aspect Ratio Gamma\n", 
00125                      (int)entity);
00126       return false;
00127   };
00128   
00129   return true;
00130 }
